description: large apartment in Bushwick. One living room  and one bedroom perfect for a couple both large and with natural light. The living room has 2 extra beds. toilet
name: 1 bedroom apartment in sunny Bushwick
review: Jose was a great host.  The location was great. The landlord  living beneath the apartment is to herself but seems very observant. So you kind of gotta be quiet. But in all, enjoyed my stay. The host and I had a toast before departure. He is a great guy and easy to communicate with when needed.
